'Norman' (Normandy: Nourmaund, GuernÃ©siais: Normand, JÃ¨rriais: Nouormand) is a
Romance language and one of the OÃ¯l languages. Norman can be classified as one
of the northern OÃ¯l languages along with Picard and Walloon. The name 'Norman-
French' is sometimes used to describe not only the Norman language, but also the
administrative languages of [[Anglo-Norman language|Anglo-Norman]] and [[Law
French]] used in England. For the most part, the written forms of modern French
and Norman are intercomprehensible.
